name: Stranger Things
description: Enter the Upside Down... if you dare.

questions.question: What is the name of the alternate dimension in Stranger Things?
Eleven's real name is Jane Hopper.
What is the name of the town where Stranger Things is set?
Mike Wheeler is Eleven's boyfriend.
Which character was held captive in the Upside Down in Season 1?
What state is Hawkins located in?
Joyce Byers is Will and Jonathan's mother.
What is the name of the police chief in Hawkins?
What tabletop game do Mike and his friends play throughout the series?
Eleven has telekinetic powers.
What is the name of the shopping mall featured in Season 3?
Dustin's girlfriend Suzie lives in Utah.
What is the name of Nancy Wheeler's younger brother?
Where does Eleven hide early in Season 1?
Steve Harrington starts the series as a popular bully-type character.
What food does Eleven famously love in Season 1?
Will Byers disappears on Halloween night in Season 1.
What high school do the older characters attend?
Which character raises a baby demogorgon named Dart in Season 2?
Robin Buckley works with Steve Harrington at Scoops Ahoy.
What is the name of the Season 4 villain?
Billy Hargrove is Max's stepbrother.
What is Eleven's adoptive father's first name?
What does Eleven use to enhance her psychic abilities in Season 1?
The Demogorgon is attracted to blood.
Where do the main characters move at the end of Season 3?
Season 1 of Stranger Things is set in the year 1983.
What instrument does Eddie Munson play in Season 4?
Lucas Sinclair makes the Hawkins High basketball team in Season 4.
What is the name of the club Eddie Munson leads at Hawkins High?
Stranger Things was created by the Duffer Brothers.
What does Eleven call Dr. Brenner throughout the series?
Lucas Sinclair is one of Mike Wheeler's best friends.
What does Dart look like before he grows into a full demodog?
Season 4 of Stranger Things is set entirely in Hawkins, Indiana.
What is the name of the forest near Hawkins where the kids often ride their bikes?
Steve Harrington becomes a protective older-brother figure to the younger kids after Season 1.
Where does Will's fake body wash up in Season 1?
Eleven temporarily loses her powers at the end of Season 3.
In which season does Scoops Ahoy ice cream parlor appear?
Will Byers is an artistic kid who loves to draw.
What year is Season 3 of Stranger Things primarily set in?
Hopper is confirmed dead at the end of Season 3.
What does Joyce use to communicate with Will in the Upside Down in Season 1?
The Demogorgon's face opens like a flower with multiple petal-like flaps.
Which character works at Radio Shack and helps the kids with technology in Season 2?
Nancy Wheeler and Jonathan Byers eventually become a couple.
What sport makes Billy Hargrove popular at Hawkins High in Season 2?
The main kids use walkie-talkies to communicate with each other.
What is the common weakness of Upside Down creatures shown in Seasons 1 and 2?
What government lab conducted experiments on Eleven?
The Mind Flayer is the primary villain in Season 1.
In what season does Max Mayfield first appear?
Hopper fakes his death at the end of Season 3.
What song does Max use to escape Vecna's curse in Season 4?
Bob Newby is killed by Demodogs in Season 2.
What is the name of Eleven's biological mother?
Jonathan Byers captures a photograph of the Demogorgon at a party in Season 1.
What does Will draw obsessively while under the influence of the Mind Flayer in Season 2?
options: A map of the Upside Down tunnels
A portrait of the Shadow Monster

questions.question: Murray Bauman is a journalist and conspiracy theorist who helps Joyce and Hopper.
Who first discovers the Russian lab beneath Starcourt Mall in Season 3?
Eleven's powers are permanently gone after Season 3.
What is the name of Dustin's long-range ham radio antenna?
In Season 4, Dr. Brenner returns and runs the NINA Project to help Eleven recover her powers.
What is the NINA Project in Season 4?
options: A program using a simulation to restore Eleven's memories and powers
A secret government lab in Nevada

questions.question: Will Byers can sense the Mind Flayer's presence because he was once possessed by it.
What song do Dustin and Suzie sing over the radio at a critical moment in Season 3?
Nancy Wheeler and Jonathan Byers investigate the cover-up of Barb Holland's death in Season 2.
What does Robin reveal to Steve while they are imprisoned by the Russians in Season 3?
options: That she is a Russian spy
That she has always loved him
That she knows about the Upside Down

questions.question: Season 2 of Stranger Things is set in 1984.
What does Hopper find hidden beneath Starcourt Mall in Season 3?
options: A portal to the Upside Down

questions.question: Eleven is the biological daughter of Terry Ives.
What are the people infected and controlled by the Mind Flayer called in Season 3?
Billy Hargrove sacrifices himself to stop the Mind Flayer in the Season 3 finale.
What newspaper does Nancy try to expose the Hawkins Lab story to in Season 2?
In Season 4, Max enters a catatonic state after Vecna nearly kills her.
What former Hawkins Lab experiment number is Kali, who shares powers with Eleven?
In Season 4, Vecna uses the image of a grandfather clock as a symbol of his curse on victims.
What is the name of the school dance the kids attend at the end of Season 2?
Dr. Brenner is definitively confirmed dead at the end of Season 1.
What does Nancy investigate for the Hawkins Post in Season 3?
Erica Sinclair is Lucas's younger sister.
What does the Mind Flayer need the Flayed to consume in Season 3 to build its physical form?
Steve Harrington failed to get into college and works at Scoops Ahoy ice cream parlor.
What is the name of the Hawkins Middle School science teacher who becomes an ally?
In Season 4, the Hawkins group splits into multiple teams across different locations simultaneously.
What is the name of the Russian guard who becomes an unlikely ally to Hopper in Season 4?
Max's surname before her mother remarried was Hargrove.
What Halloween costumes do the boys wear for trick-or-treating in Season 2?
In Season 2, Eleven travels to Chicago and meets a girl with psychic powers called Kali.
What visions does Will experience in Season 2 that show him glimpses of the Upside Down?
In Season 3, Eleven spies on people remotely by using her powers while blindfolded in a dark space.
What is the name of the D&D campaign the Hellfire Club is running at the start of Season 4?
Eddie Munson is falsely accused of Chrissy Cunningham's murder in Season 4.
Which character acts as the Dungeon Master in the boys' D&D group?
Jonathan and Will move to California with Joyce and Eleven at the start of Season 4.
What is the name of the sympathetic government scientist introduced in Season 2?
In Season 4, Vecna is revealed to be Henry Creel, also known as Subject One.
What does Joyce notice at her home that signals a supernatural disturbance at the start of Season 4?
options: Iron filings forming patterns on the floor
Refrigerator magnets falling off the fridge

questions.question: In Season 3, Alexei the Soviet scientist develops a fondness for Slurpees and American pop culture.
What is Eleven's lab subject number at Hawkins Lab?
Henry Creel is also known as Subject One and later becomes Vecna.
What is the name of the Soviet prison facility where Hopper is held in Season 4?
Eddie Munson survives the events of Season 4.
What D&D creature name do the kids assign to the Season 1 monster?
What Metallica song does Eddie play on his guitar atop a trailer in the Upside Down in Season 4?
The Stranger Things theme music was composed by Kyle Dixon and Michael Stein of the band S U R V I V E.
Which actor plays the adult Henry Creel / Vecna in Season 4?
Robert Englund, famous for playing Freddy Krueger, appears in Season 4 as Victor Creel.
How does Henry Creel escape Hawkins Lab and transform into Vecna?
options: Eleven removes his inhibitor chip and then blasts him through a gate into the Upside Down
He kills all the guards and escapes through a natural portal
He is transported there by a Soviet experiment
He discovers a gate and jumps through voluntarily

questions.question: The Upside Down is depicted as frozen in time at the year 1983, the year the first gate was opened.
What is the name of the actress who plays Joyce Byers?
Dr. Martin Brenner is Eleven's biological father.
What was Terry Ives participating in when she was unknowingly dosed with psychedelics by Hawkins Lab?
Victor Creel was imprisoned in a psychiatric facility for murders that his son Henry actually committed.
What was the working title of Stranger Things before it was renamed?
Henry Creel committed his first murders as a child by killing members of his own family.
What is the name of the character played by actor Paul Reiser in Season 2?
The Mind Flayer's physical form in Season 3 is constructed from melted human flesh and chemicals.
What does the tattoo on Eleven's wrist read?
Hopper had a daughter named Sara who died of cancer, shown in Season 1 flashbacks.
What key rule does Hopper set for Eleven and Mike that becomes a running joke in Season 3?
options: Keep the door open three inches

questions.question: The four gates that open over Hawkins in the Season 4 finale form the shape of Vecna's sigil when seen from above.
What carnival game does Alexei become obsessed with at the 4th of July fair in Season 3?
Eleven was born inside Hawkins National Laboratory.
In Season 2, what does Eleven find when she visits her biological mother, Terry Ives?
options: Terry is in a vegetative state caused by electroshock therapy from Hawkins Lab
Terry is secretly working for Hawkins Lab
Terry has been moved to a psychiatric facility

questions.question: The rainbow room at Hawkins Lab was used as a reward space where child test subjects could play with toys.
What type of military weapons does the Army use to try to burn out the Upside Down tunnels in Season 2?
In Season 4, Chrissy Cunningham is the first on-screen Hawkins victim of Vecna.
Which actress plays young Eleven in the NINA Project flashback sequences in Season 4?
The Demogorgon in Stranger Things is inspired by the two-headed demon prince from D&D lore.
What is the full name of the conspiracy theorist journalist who assists Joyce and Hopper?
The Stranger Things score was heavily inspired by synth composers such as John Carpenter and Tangerine Dream.
What name does Eleven use when she arrives in Chicago to meet Kali in Season 2?
According to Season 4 lore, Vecna created the hive mind and began shaping the Upside Down long before Eleven opened the gate in 1983.
What is the name of the Russian black-market smuggler in Season 4 who initially betrays Hopper and Dimitri?
Yuri Ismaylov in Season 4 is a pilot and smuggler who is eventually turned to help the heroes.
What does the Mind Flayer need the Flayed to consume in Season 3 to build its physical form?
The inhibitor chip implanted in Henry Creel suppressed his powers but was not designed to kill him upon removal.
In Season 4, what specific past trauma does Vecna exploit in Max Mayfield to draw her into his curse?
options: Her loneliness after moving to Hawkins

questions.question: The kids call the Mind Flayer the 'Shadow Monster' before they learn its D&D name.
What is the name of Eddie Munson's uncle and guardian in Season 4?
The Upside Down atmosphere and particles are toxic to humans with prolonged exposure.
What specific Metallica album is the song Master of Puppets from?
In Season 4, the show confirms retroactively that Vecna has been the puppet master behind all supernatural events in Hawkins since Season 1.
What is the name of the Hawkins police dispatcher who appears throughout the series?
The Dungeons and Dragons character Vecna is canonically a powerful lich in the game's lore.
What does Eleven see when she psychically spies on the Demogorgon in the void in Season 1?
Hopper's letter read at the end of Season 3 was written to Eleven but never delivered because he disappeared.
In Season 4 Part 2, what does Eleven do inside the NINA simulation to recover her full powers?
options: She relives and changes the moment she first opened the gate
She defeats the simulation version of Vecna
She accepts her identity as Jane Hopper
She psychically travels into the real Upside Down
